events.blurb: the Local Authority Social Services Act 1970 enacted
events.description:
"Under the Local Authority Social Services Act 1970, local authority
social work services and social care provision, including those for children,
were unified in social services departments."
events.source:
Mr. David Batty.
"[Timeline: the history of child protection](https://www.theguardian.com/society/2004/apr/23/childrensservices.childprotection)"
*[The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/)* 2004-04-23.  Last Viewed:
2021-06-04.
